meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: U.N. Rejects Jenin Claims A United Nations report dismissed Palestinian claims that 500 people died when Israel invaded the Jenin refugee camp in April.
Stanley Halts Bermuda Plan Stanley Works, the Connecticut tool maker, said that it was abandoning its proposal to reincorporate in Bermuda.
U.N. Rejects Jenin Claims A United Nations report dismissed Palestinian claims that 500 people died when Israel invaded the Jenin refugee camp in April.
Stanley Halts Bermuda Plan Stanley Works, the Connecticut tool maker, said that it was abandoning its proposal to reincorporate in Bermuda.
Again, Florida Race Muddled Katherine Harris, Florida's top elections official, quit retroactively after missing a deadline to resign to run for Congress.
Dispute Over 9/11 Inquiry The F.B.I., trying to find the source of news leaks, has asked some lawmakers to take lie detector tests. Several have refused.
